# AI Resume Advisor API Monitoring Dashboard

---

### ðŸš€ Real-time API Performance and Health Monitoring

This dashboard provides comprehensive monitoring for the FastAPI application deployed on Azure Functions.

content.title: Key Performance Indicators

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(1h)
| summarize 
    RequestCount = count(), 
    AvgDuration = avg(duration), 
    P95Duration = percentile(duration, 95),
    FailureRate = countif(success == false) * 100.0 / count()
  by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| project 
    timestamp,
    ['Requests'] = RequestCount,
    ['Avg Duration (ms)'] = round(AvgDuration, 2),
    ['P95 Duration (ms)'] = round(P95Duration, 2),
    ['Failure Rate (%)'] = round(FailureRate, 2)
| render timechart
content.title: Request Trends - Last Hour

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| extend endpoint = tostring(parse_url(url).Path)
| summarize 
    Count = count(),
    AvgDuration = round(avg(duration), 2),
    P95Duration = round(percentile(duration, 95), 2),
    ErrorRate = round(countif(success == false) * 100.0 / count(), 2)
  by endpoint, resultCode
| order by Count desc
| take 20
content.title: Endpoint Performance Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| where name == "keyword_extraction_request" or name == "RequestStarted" or name == "cache_hourly_report"
| extend eventType = name
| summarize Count = count() by eventType, bin(timestamp, 1h)
| render columnchart
content.title: Custom Events Distribution

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(1h)
| where success == false
| extend endpoint = tostring(parse_url(url).Path)
| summarize ErrorCount = count() by endpoint, resultCode, cloud_RoleName
| order by ErrorCount desc
| take 10
content.title: Recent Errors

content.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp > ago(1h)
| where type == "HTTP" or name contains "openai" or name contains "cognitive"
| summarize 
    AvgDuration = avg(duration), 
    Count = count(),
    FailureRate = countif(success == false) * 100.0 / count()
  by name, type
| order by Count desc
content.title: External Dependencies

content.query:
// Cache Performance Metrics
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| where name == "cache_hourly_report"
| extend 
    HitRate = todouble(customDimensions.hit_rate_percent),
    TotalRequests = toint(customDimensions.total_requests),
    CostSaved = todouble(customDimensions.total_cost_saved)
| project timestamp, HitRate, TotalRequests, CostSaved
| render timechart
content.title: Cache Performance Trends

content.query:
// Security Events
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| where name == "request_blocked" or name contains "security"
| extend 
    ThreatType = tostring(customDimensions.threats),
    ClientIP = tostring(customDimensions.client_ip),
    RiskLevel = tostring(customDimensions.risk_level)
| summarize ThreatCount = count() by ThreatType, RiskLevel
| render piechart
content.title: Security Threats Distribution

content.query:
// Response Time Distribution
requests
| where timestamp > ago(1h)
| where duration > 0
| extend DurationBucket = case(
    duration <= 100, "0-100ms",
    duration <= 500, "100-500ms",
    duration <= 1000, "500-1000ms",
    duration <= 2000, "1-2s",
    duration <= 5000, "2-5s",
    ">5s"
)
| summarize Count = count() by DurationBucket
| order by DurationBucket
content.title: Response Time Distribution
